title: Cyber-flashing: 'I get explicit messages every day'
description: Influencer Elle Edwards lets us inside her DMs to show the extent of sexual abuse faced by women online.

title: Covid: The Mexican villages refusing to vaccinate
description: Residents in remote Mexican towns are being influenced by lies and rumours swirling around on WhatsApp.

title: Sudan's Darfur conflict's latest surge in violence displaces thousands
description: "I have cried so much, my eyes can barely see," one mother tells the BBC after seeing her brother die.

title: Cocaine in the UK: The DJ and friends helping addicts beat their 'beasts'
description: More people in the UK are taking cocaine. A DJ and ex-addict in Liverpool is helping them stop.

title: Tens of thousands of Jurassic fossils found at secret site
description: The fossils were originally uncovered by two hobby palaeontologists during lockdown.

title: Meet Mick, Scarborough's 'fly-tipping hero'
description: Mick Couzens is working with different community groups and the council in Scarborough to tackle the problem head on.

title: The battle for Indonesia's Gold Island
description: There are fears that a mine will threaten Sangihe island's ancient forests and local water supply.

title: Indian actress stirs debate over women's role at cremations
description: Indian actress Mandira Bedi made news for doing her husband's last rites, generally a male preserve.

description: On Saturday, Northern Ireland hit record-breaking heights as thermometers soared above 30C.

title: Jeff Bezos and crew launch into space on New Shepard
description: Billionaire Jeff Bezos has launched into space, in the first crewed flight of his rocket ship, New Shepard.

title: Rescheduling Games 'caused sleepless nights', says IOC president
description: Rescheduling the Tokyo Olympics "caused sleepless nights" but must go ahead "to give hope" for the future, says IOC President Thomas Bach.

title: UK to bake in 33C amid extreme heat warning
description: Parts of Wales and southern and central England could be hotter than Tenerife and Marbella later.

title: Raye and Polydor split after claims record label wouldn't release debut album

title: Eid al-Adha prayers continue as rockets fired in Afghanistan

description: The government was too slow to tell women they would be directly affected by the rising state pension age.

title: Jeff Bezos to blast into space aboard New Shepard rocket ship

title: Covid: Boris Johnson resisted autumn lockdown as only over-80s dying - Dominic Cummings
description: Boris Johnson also questioned whether the NHS would be overwhelmed, his former aide tells the BBC.

description: There was a three-hour tailback on the M4 in Wiltshire after a lorry caught fire.

description: The Premier League player has since been bailed and suspended by his club while inquiries continue.

description: Trap shooter Kirsty Hegarty tells BBC Sport NI all about trap shooting and a surprising addition to her Team GB kit which got her rather excited.

title: Plans to modernise power of attorney system
description: People can put someone in charge of their affairs but the process is criticised for being slow to enact.
